branchCategory.name: VQC4000 Manifold/Valve Assembly with EX260
branchCategory.description: <p>VQC with EX260 serial interface is a compact and cost effective fieldbus solution. It can control up to 32 solenoids in one manifold. Available protocols are EtherNet/IP&trade;, Profinet®, EtherCAT®, PROFIBUS DP®, DeviceNet&trade; and CC-Link. EX260 series has standard dual port connectivity to eliminate the need of switches or branch connector, reducing wiring and component cost. IP67 enclosure rating ensures protection against dust and washdown environment.</p>
